sqlQuery.name: RawExperiments
sqlQuery.sql: select aa.library_name as norm_experiment, to_char(norm_tag_count, '99999') as norm_count, --to_char(library_total_tag_count, '99999') as total_norm_count, --to_char(100 *(library_tag_percentage), '990D00') || '%' as norm_percent from apidb.SAGETAGANALYSISATTRIBUTES aa, apidb.SAGETAGATTRIBUTES a where a.source_id = $$primaryKey$$ and a.composite_element_id = aa.composite_element_id order by library_name

sqlQuery.name: NormExperiments
sqlQuery.sql: select a.library_name as norm_experiment, to_char(a.tag_count, '99999') as norm_count, to_char(a.library_total_tag_count, '99999') as total_norm_count, to_char(100 *(a.library_tag_percentage), '990D00') || '%' as norm_percent from apidb.SAGETAGANALYSISATTRIBUTES, apidb.SAGETAGATTRIBUTES a where a.source_id = $$primaryKey$$ and aa.composite_element_id = a.composite_element_id order by library_name

sqlQuery.name: AlignedGenes
sqlQuery.sql: select sg.gene_source_id, case when sg.antisense = 1 then 'antisense' else 'sense' end as gene_strand, sg.distance as bp_from_gene from apidb.SAGETAGGENE sg, apidb.SAGETAGATTRIBUTES a where a.na_feature_id = sg.tag_feature_id and a.composite_element_id in (select composite_element_id from apidb.SageTagAttributes where source_id = $$primaryKey$$)
